content:
After ./zulip-server-*/scripts/setup/install --certbot \
--email=YOUR_EMAIL --hostname=YOUR_HOSTNAME
I get this at the end of the download, with no link

W: The repository 'http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu lucid Release' does not have a Release file.
E: Failed to fetch http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/lucid/main/source/Sources 404 Not Found [IP: 91.189.91.23 80]
E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
@martin it sounds like you're trying to install on Ubuntu Lucid, which is no longer supported by Ubuntu.
@martin Lucid is from 2012 and isn't supported by Ubuntu upstream -- that's what that error says.
